tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_sentiment_analysis (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    trading_decision VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    post_likes INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_name TEXT, follower_count INT, posting_frequency INT);
CREATE TABLE posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, post_content TEXT, post_date TIMESTAMP, likes_count INT);
CREATE TABLE comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, commenter_name TEXT, comment_content TEXT, comment_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sentiment_score FLOAT, sentiment_category TEXT);
CREATE TABLE trading_decisions (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, decision_score FLOAT, decision_category TEXT);
